LanguageData.GUC_BodySizeFilter_Description: Filter mountable animals by body size
LanguageData.GUC_Animalselection_Description: Use the filter above to filter by body size, and click tiles to make exceptions
LanguageData.GUC_Drawselection_Description: Configure which animals should be drawn in front of pawns, and which ones should be drawn behind pawns. Most animals should be drawn behind pawns, but some (especially animals with long necks or horns) look better when drawn in front of pawns
